definition: America (including North, Central and South America)/the Americas/abbr. for 亞美利加洲|亚美利加洲[Ya4 mei3 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

pinyin: Mei3 zhou1 Guo2 jia1 Zu3 zhi1

definition: the Americas/North and South American continents
(bird species of China) green-winged teal (Anas carolinensis)
(bird species of China) American golden plover (Pluvialis dominica)

sentences.english: Dvorak was interested in the folk music of both Europe and North America.
sentences.chinese: 德沃夏克對歐洲和北美洲的民間音樂很有興趣。

sentences.english: This event long antedates the arrival of Columbus in America.
sentences.chinese: 這件事的發生遠在哥倫布到達美洲之前。

sentences.english: Onchocerciasis is limited to six Latin American countries.
sentences.chinese: 盤尾絲蟲病僅在6個拉丁美洲國家存在。

sentences.english: In 1619 the first Negro slaves were brought to America from West Africa.
sentences.chinese: 1619年第一批黑人奴隸從西非運到美洲。

sentences.english: I thought the Cougars were going to win for sure.
sentences.chinese: 我開始可是認爲美洲豹肯定贏的。

sentences.english: They hoped to obtain exit visas here and escaped to the New World At first, Rick can't forgive that Ilsa's gone back on[3] her word.
sentences.chinese: 他們希望能在這裏得到出境證後逃離到美洲新大陸去。

sentences.english: Already almost all Californian Native American languages are in danger of extinction.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎所有加州當地的美洲土語已有消失之虞。

sentences.english: What is the difference between an alligator and a crocodile?
sentences.chinese: 短吻美洲鱷和鱷魚有什麼區別？

sentences.english: The Dickey County project is outside the cranes' normal migratory flight path.
sentences.chinese: 美洲鶴正常遷徙飛行線路沒有經過迪基縣的項目。

sentences.english: Aquatic resources along the coast of South America.
Latin America has a couple of candidates, but they are trailing.
sentences.chinese: 拉丁美洲有許多候選人，但是他們正在落後。

sentences.english: Jatropha curcas is a non-edible shrub that is native to Central America.
sentences.chinese: 桐油樹是一種不可食用的灌木，原產於中美洲。

sentences.english: They knew my work as a religious producer in Latin America.
sentences.chinese: 他們知道我在拉丁美洲地區是一名宗教製片人。

sentences.english: His forefather was abducted to America two centuries ago.
sentences.chinese: 他的祖先是兩百年前被綁架到美洲的。

sentences.english: The Britishmen arrived on the American coasts.
Puma fur was found clinging to bushes.
sentences.chinese: 灌木叢中也發現了粘在上面的美洲獅毛。

definition: Africa/abbr. for 阿非利加洲[A1 fei1 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
Latin America/abbr. for 拉丁美洲
the Americas/North and South American continents

pinyin: Ma3 da2 jia1 si1 jia1 Dao3
